resources.string: We are a group of professionals who have gathered knowledge about how the market works through personal experience and intense study from various sources.\n\nWe work as mentors for students, proving them firm footing, we work as catalysts for organisations, helping them find interns, we work as a team ourselves helping secure multiple futures.

Our intense research of the present job market has lead to the inference that internships and training largely affect a student's future and the right kind of internships and training programs have the potential to change one's life for the better.

With this in mind, we aim to bridge the ever widening gap between the corporate world and the education industry.

Through our interactive training programs and carefully chosen internships with the aid of our modern interactive learning tools, our mission is to create market ready professionals, with a bright future ahead of them.
